desc: A culmination of the development of critical/analytical skills that facilitate and encourage the integrative focus of the major, this team-taught seminar is structured around a chosen theme, Critical Issues in the Arts in the Early 21st Century. Students select a creative research topic that explores the seminar theme from a specific perspective and integrates the four art forms. Performance/exhibit fee required. Counts toward the major: Interdisciplinary Fine Arts.
name: Senior Studies
